alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 8:26PM EDT until May 26 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in west central Indiana... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 826 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Crawfordsville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crawfordsville and Darlington. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 26 and 42. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
